articles.author: Maggie Gordon, Monica Rhor
articles.title: Details emerge about victims, survivors of Santa Fe shooting
articles.description: Rome Shubert was sitting in his first-period art class shortly before 7:30 a.m. Friday when another student barged in and threw something on the desks behind him. Rome heard three loud pops and dropped to the ground, flipping his desk in front of him to shielâ€¦
